description: The DOC_INFORMATION table contains information about documents, including scanned and electronically signed documents.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document information record.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of document described by this document information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOC_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status of the document described by this document information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unknown


Received


Not Received


Accepted


Error

columns.name: DOC_DESCR
columns.description: A short free text description of the document described by this document information.

columns.name: DOC_RECV_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the document described by this document information was received.

columns.name: RECV_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The employee who received the document described by this document information. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: PAT_REP
columns.description: The free text name of the person who legally represents the patient described by this document information.

columns.name: DT_ON_DOC
columns.description: The date which appears on the document described by this document information.

columns.name: DOC_EXPIR_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the document described by this document information expires.

columns.name: DOC_LOC
columns.description: A short free text description of the location of the paper copy of the document described by this document information.

columns.name: IS_SCANNED_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether there is a scanned image version of the document described by this document information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SCAN_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the document described by this document information was scanned.

columns.name: SCAN_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The employee who scanned the document described by this document information. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: SCAN_DEP_ID
columns.description: The department where the document described by this document information was scanned.

columns.name: SCAN_FILE
columns.description: The file name of the scanned image version of the document described by this document information.

columns.name: IS_ESIGNED_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether the document described by this document information has been electronically signed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SCANNED_YN

columns.name: ESIGN_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the document described by this document information was electronically signed.

columns.name: WITNESS_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The employee who witnessed the electronic signing of the document described by this document information. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: ESIGN_DEP_ID
columns.description: The department where the document described by this document information was electronically signed.

columns.name: ESIGN_HTML_FILE
columns.description: The file name of either the template HTML file of the document to be electronically signed prior to it being electronically signed or the unique file name of the HTML file of the electronically signed document described by this document information.

columns.name: DOC_REQ_DT
columns.description: The date when a copy of the type of document described by this document information was requested.

columns.name: IS_REQ_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether the type of document described by this document information was requested.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SCANNED_YN

columns.name: DOC_EFF_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the document described by this document information becomes effective.

columns.name: IS_EFF_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether the document is in effect.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SCANNED_YN

columns.name: DOC_DISCL_DT
columns.description: The date when a copy of the document described by this document information was last disclosed.

columns.name: DOC_REVOK_DT
columns.description: The date when the type of document described by this document information was revoked.

columns.name: IS_REVOK_YN
columns.description:
Specifies whether the document was revoked.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SCANNED_YN

columns.name: DOC_LOCATION_C
columns.description:
The category entry for the location of the document.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOC_PT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with the document record.

columns.name: DOC_CSN
columns.description: This stores the contact serial number of the encounter that this record is attached to, if applicable.

columns.name: DOC_CLM_ID
columns.description: Stores Claim (CLM) ID for the claim that the document is associated with, used by Tapestry.

columns.name: DOC_CVG_ID
columns.description: Stores Coverage (CVG) ID for the coverage that the document is associated with, used by Tapestry.

columns.name: DOC_NCS_ID
columns.description: Stores customer service (NCS) ID for the customer relationship management (CRM) that the document is associated with, used by Tapestry.

columns.name: DOC_NMM_ID
columns.description: Stores the case master (NMM) ID for the case that the document is associated with, used by Tapestry.

columns.name: DOC_RFL_ID
columns.description: Stores Referral (RFL) ID for the Referral that the document is associated with, used by Tapestry.

columns.name: DOC_SER_ID
columns.description: Stores Provider/Resource Directory ID (SER) for the provider that the document is associated with, used by Tapestry.

columns.name: RECORD_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record state category number for the document record. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inactive


Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: SOURCE_ETX_ID
columns.description: Stores the SmartText (ETX) ID that this document (DCS) record was created from.

columns.name: SOURCE_ETX_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: DOC_HNO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record associated with this document.

columns.name: SCAN_LWS_ID
columns.description: This item stores the id of the workstation where the document was scanned.

columns.name: ESIG_SIGNED_BY
columns.description: eSignature of person document was signed by.

columns.name: ESIGNED_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The relationship between the patient and the person who signed the form (self, parent, spouse, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOC_SRVC_DTTM
columns.description: The service date and time of the document.

columns.name: SCAN_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the most clinically relevant date for the document. From top to bottom, it looks to the service date/time (I DCS 246/247), the order prioritized instant (I ORD 24), the encounter date, and the import date/time (I DCS 310/315).

columns.name: DOC_STORAGE_LVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The level at which the document is attached to the patient's record. For example, the document could be stored at the patient, encounter, or hospital account level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Encounter


Hospital Account


Not Patient Linked


Unindexed

columns.name: SOURCE_DOC
columns.description: The identifier for the document (DCS) record's source document.  This column is only populated for DCS records of type Discharge Attachments. If the document was created from a SmartText (ETX) record, this column contains the ID of that ETX record. If the document was created from an HTML document in the References Activity, this column contains the unique identifier from the CRS.mdb file.

columns.name: DOC_CREAT_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The department where this document was created.

columns.name: PT_ENT_DRAW_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the status of the documents (DCS) record - Is it ready to show?


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Completed

columns.name: PT_ENT_DRAWING_CMT
columns.description: Holds any associated comments from a patient-entered drawing question. Only present for documents (DCS) records of type 32010 used by MyChart and Welcome.

columns.name: PHOTO_APPROVED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether or not this document (DCS) record is in the history of the patient's photos.  If not, includes the reason the photo was rejected.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Approved Photo


Denied - Unknown


Denied - Other


Denied - User Error


Denied - Inappropriate / Innocent


Denied - Inappropriate / Abusive


Denied - Suspected Fraud


Denied - Confirmed Fraud

columns.name: PHOTO_APRV_APPL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The application that processed the approval/denial of the photo.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Demographics


Canto/Haiku


EDI


Kiosk


In Basket


Cadence


Prelude


MyChart

columns.name: WEB_USER_ID
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the MyChart user who created this document record, for patient-generated document records.

columns.name: NEED_ENC_YN
columns.description:
This item is used to denote whether a document needs to be attached to an encounter or not. For Patient level documents this would always be No. For encounter level documents, depending on whether it is attached or detached from an encounter, this would say No or Yes respectively.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_SCANNED_YN

columns.name: PERFORMING_PROV_ID
columns.description: Used to store the Provider's name who is performing the procedure mentioned in the e-signature consent form.

columns.name: ESIG_TMPLT_USED
columns.description: Stores a link to the template used to sign the document

columns.name: TMPLT_SF_CNTCT
columns.description: Contact of the SmartForm used to collect information for this document.

columns.name: RESEARCH_STUDY_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the research study associated with this document.

columns.name: FT_CONSENT_PROCS
columns.description: Stores free text procedures for consent documents

columns.name: ORIGINAL_DOC_ID
columns.description: Stores the link to the original (unannotated) document.

columns.name: DOC_SPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item can be extended to hold possible values for the specialty that a document can be associated with.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOC_SRVR_NAME_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the desktop integration (FDI) record that was used for scanning the document.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOC_SOURCE_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Determines the source of the document rather than the document's type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Care Everywhere Query and Retrieve


Care Everywhere Push


Care Everywhere Print for Patient


Chart Gateway Query


Toggle Navigator Authorization


Toggle Navigator Snapshot


Received DICOM Image


MyChart Advance Care Planning Upload

columns.name: RX_CUST_ID_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the categories for the types of customer ID documents used to pick up prescriptions from outpatient pharmacies.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Driver's License


Passport


Employee ID


Other

columns.name: RX_CUST_ID_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the customer ID number.

columns.name: CE_SERVICE_START_DATE
columns.description: Service start date for a received Care Everywhere external authorization

columns.name: CE_SERVICE_END_DATE
columns.description: Service end date for a received Care Everywhere external authorization

columns.name: DOC_PND_APRV_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds status of document undergoing review


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pending Approval


Rejected

columns.name: DOC_REJ_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Denial reason


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Invalid signature


Missing documentation


Inconsistent documentation


Illegible


Invalid form


Missing signature


Relationship doesn't match document


Relationship not supported by current documentation


Contact name and document do not match

columns.name: DOC_REJ_RSN_TEXT
columns.description: Rejection reason freetext

columns.name: COMM_ORIG_LRP_ID
columns.description: This item stores the original report (LRP) ID when a report is converted to a PDF.

columns.name: COMM_ORIG_LRP_ID_REPORT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the report

columns.name: CREATED_STUDY_AMENDMENT
columns.description: The ID of the research study amendment considered to be the consent version signed for Research Consent type document (DCS) records. Use the RESEARCH_STUDY_ID column to link to RESEARCH_VERSION_INFO table which has the user-entered version number (STUDY_VERSION) as well as other information.

columns.name: EFF_STUDY_AMENDMENT
columns.description: The ID of the research study amendment considered to be the current effective version for Research Consent type document (DCS) records. Use the RESEARCH_STUDY_ID column to link to RESEARCH_VERSION_INFO table which has the user-entered version number (STUDY_VERSION) as well as other information.
